'''The Hobbit Calendar 2003''' features illustrations by [[Lydia Postma]].

* Dorset Press (US) ISBN 0-7607-3382-1
* Pavilion (The Shire) (UK) ISBN 1-86205-553-X
* Dimensions: 12 x 13 1/4 inches
* Stapled
* Punched hanging hole
* Shrink-wrapped
